metadata.title: CVE-2020-1695 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in all resteasy 3.x.x versions prior to 3.12.0.Final andall resteasy 4.x.x versions prior to 4.6.0.Final, where an improper inputvalidation results in returning an illegal header that integrates into theserver's response. This flaw may result in an injection, which leads tounexpected behavior when the HTTP response is constructed.

criterions.comment: resteasy package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
resteasy3.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
